title: Is Final Fantasy VII Remake Actually a Trilogy? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 04.28.20
description:
Imran and Fran discuss whether Final Fantasy VII Remake should stick to being three games.

Time Stamps - 
00:02:05 - Housekeeping
TODAY, it’s our second sponsored Predator: Hunting Grounds stream. Tuesday at 2 pm, Kinda Funny is going to hunt down the one, the only -- THE PREDATOR Al Tribesman on twitch.tv/kindafunnygames.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mohammed Mohammed, Al Tribesman, Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:04:55 - Google Stadia Connect 4.28.20
00:19:50 - Official PlayStation Magazine PS5 Stuff Debunked
00:36:00 - Final Fantasy VII Remake creator says that the project might be broken into 'shorter stories' to get it out quicker (Chris Carter at Destructoid)
00:45:17 -  OLD SPICE
00:46:02 - Xbox Series X: Phil Spencer Talks About Why He's So Excited For The Next-Gen Console (Gamespot by Eddie Makuch)
00:53:05 - Valorant Making Anti-Cheat Changes After Player Outcry
00:57:50 - Koei Tecmo still plans on localizing Persona 5 Scramble  (Chris Carter at Destructoid)
00:59:55 - Out today
01:02:02 - Squad Up: Frankfurtter(Twitch (birthday stream)) - Ladymacbehth
01:02:30 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:
Greg and Gary
